name: PDEP Just Another Day On The Job
name_original: PDEP Just Another Day On The Job
description:
Description : 

In the streets of the town Emirs Port, you a police officer must keep them safe.  If an emergency happens, you will be the one to respond.  Patrol around the city checking for anything suspicious.  If a bank is held up, you must respond to help protect your city.  Is your shot slacking? Head over to Guns Are Us and hit the range.  Good Luck Officer!

This game is in early development.

Controls : 

W A S D to move around

Use the mouse to look around

Press 2 to go Code 2

Press 3 to go Code 3

Press 4 and 5 to use turn signals

Press 1 to turn off all lights.

Notice : 

To go off duty, drive into the front door of the station where you first went on duty.
